Summary: Stationary blue green laser light playing off the clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to walk my dog at around 11:40 pm I noticed a blue green laser light playing off the clouds. The light is stationary and is over northeast Boulder currently. Maybe the northern lights? I am not sure if they could be seen in Colorado. The light has remained in place for about 30 minutes, it is still there as i type. I woke my wife to witness this light too. I left a 9 news tip as well for a local news channel in my area. Hoping that other people may see this light too.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around August 9th 2011
